item.title: 为什么人脑可能推动下一场科技革命？
item.description:
在本期的 Primer节目中，我们将探索生物计算的世界，科学家们正在模糊生物与合成之间的界限。【原文：

On this episode of Primer, we explore the world of biocomputing, where scientists are blurring the lines between the biological and synthetic.

】

item.title: 美联储调查显示小型企业销售增长面临压力
item.description: 美联储的一项年度调查显示，去年报告销售额下降的小企业主多于增长的小企业主，这是自 2021 年以来首次出现这种情况。【原文：More small business owners reported a decline in sales last year than an increase, the first time that’s been the case since 2021, according to an annual survey by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 保乐施同意收购软银支持的阿尔托药房
item.description: 据知情人士透露，由软银集团支持的旧金山数字制药初创公司 Alto Pharmacy 同意被保路仕控股有限公司收购。【原文：Alto Pharmacy, a digital pharmaceutical startup based in San Francisco that’s backed by SoftBank Group Corp., agreed to be acquired by Paulus Holdings Ltd., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 印度计划上半年销售 8 万亿卢比债券
item.description: 印度宣布的上半财年借款计划低于预期。【原文：India announced a borrowing plan for the first half of the fiscal year that’s lower than expectations.】

item.title: 波兰格拉平斯基不为疲软数据所动，保持鹰派展望
item.description: 波兰央行行长亚当-格拉平斯基（Adam Glapinski）坚持认为有必要按兵不动，并未因数据显示通胀和增长态势低于预期而动摇。【原文：Polish central bank Governor Adam Glapinski stuck to his guns regarding the need for interest rates to stay on hold, unswayed by data showing softer-than-expected inflation and growth dynamics.】

item.title: CoreWeave 计划将首次公开募股规模削减至 15 亿美元
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，CoreWeave 公司打算将其首次公开募股的规模削减至 15 亿美元左右，这表明近期股市的波动正在损害对即使是备受期待的上市的需求。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. intends to cut the size of its initial public offering to around $1.5 billion, a person with knowledge of the matter said, in a sign of how the recent stock market volatility is hurting demand for even highly-anticipated listings.】

item.title: 保守党提议为加拿大基金提供额外免税储蓄
item.description: 保守党领袖皮埃尔-波利耶夫（Pierre Poilievre）承诺为投资本地公司的加拿大人提供额外的 5,000 加元（3,500 美元）免税储蓄空间。【原文：Conservative Leader Pierre Poilievre is promising an additional C$5,000 ($3,500) in tax-free savings room for Canadians who invest in local companies.】

item.title: 人工智能对动力的渴求可以用灵活性来驯服
item.description:
杜克大学的一项研究表明，美国可以在不建设大量电厂的情况下迅速为其电网增加巨大的负荷。【原文：

The US can quickly add huge loads to its electric grids without building a slew of plants, a Duke University study says.

】

item.title: 阿根廷称其国际货币基金组织（IMF）新计划总额将达 200 亿美元
item.description: 阿根廷经济部长路易斯-卡普托（Luis Caputo）在周四的一次会议上表示，阿根廷未来与国际货币基金组织（IMF）的合作计划金额将达到 200 亿美元，而执行董事会的批准可能需要数周时间。【原文：Argentina’s future program with the International Monetary Fund will be for $20 billion, while executive board approval could take weeks, Economy Minister Luis Caputo said at a conference Thursday.】

item.title: 尼克斯队播音员获得一周缓刑以解决未偿还债务问题
item.description: MSG Networks 及其贷款人已获得为期一周的延期，以便就 10 月份到期的 8 亿多美元债务进行谈判。【原文：MSG Networks and its lenders have gotten a week-long extension to negotiate on more than $800 million of debt that has been due since October.】

item.title: 美国经济上季度增长 2.4%，快于此前预期
item.description: 美国第四季度的经济扩张速度快于此前的估计，而一项关键的通胀指标则被下调。【原文：The US economy expanded at a faster pace in the fourth quarter than previously estimated while a key measure of inflation was revised lower.】

item.title: 美国商品贸易逆差因出口增加而略有收窄
item.description: 由于出口强劲，2 月份美国商品贸易逆差四个月来首次收窄，但高进口仍表明企业试图抢在关税之前采取行动。【原文：The US merchandise-trade deficit narrowed in February for the first time in four months on stronger exports, though high imports still pointed to companies trying to get ahead of tariffs.】

item.title: 国际交易所 Circle 将探索使用 USDC 稳定币
item.description: 纽约证券交易所的母公司洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc.【原文：Intercontinental Exchange Inc., parent of the New York Stock Exchange, is joining with Circle Internet Financial Ltd. to explore the use of the crypto firm’s USDC stablecoin, as well as tokenized money market funds, to develop new products.】

item.title: 意大利和法国呼吁修改欧洲碳边境税
item.description: 意大利带头呼吁修改欧盟具有里程碑意义的碳边境税，以减轻成员国的行政负担，防止工业外流。【原文：Italy led calls for changes to the European Union’s landmark carbon border levy to reduce the administrative burden on member states and prevent an exodus of industries.】

item.title: 英国石油公司计划出售奥地利燃油零售点，包括电动汽车充电设施
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）计划在奥地利出售 260 多个燃油零售点，其中包括电动汽车充电资产，因为这家英国能源巨头正努力降低成本，提高回报。【原文：BP Plc plans to sell over 260 fuel-retail sites across Austria, including electric vehicle charging assets, as the UK energy giant seeks to reduce costs and boost returns.】

item.title: 贝莱德预计到 2030 年成果 ETF 规模将跃升至 6,500 亿美元
item.description: 世界上最大的资产管理公司正豪赌越来越多的由衍生品驱动的 ETF，这种 ETF 正在颠覆主动投资组合管理的艺术。【原文：The world’s largest asset manager is betting big on a growing breed of derivatives-powered ETFs that’s shaking up the art of active portfolio management.】

item.title: 高盛认为土耳其将提高主要利率以平息市场波动
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said Turkey will probably raise its main interest rate by mid-April, following a week of political and market turmoil sparked by the detention of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s biggest rival.】

item.title: 瑞典将为新核电提供政府贷款
item.description: 瑞典将提供公共贷款来资助新的核电项目，因为该国正在想方设法满足预期激增的电力需求。【原文：Sweden will offer public loans to fund new nuclear power projects as the nation seeks ways to meet an expected surge in demand for electricity.】

item.title: 汽车运输公司在特朗普最新关税政策后暴跌
item.description: 在美国总统特朗普扩大贸易战，对非美国制造的汽车征收关税后，远洋运输公司股价暴跌。【原文：Shares of companies that haul cars across oceans plunged after President Trump widened his trade war with tariffs on vehicles not made in the US.】

item.title: 中央银行限制现金促使尼日利亚银行举借短期债务
item.description: 由于中央银行的现金限制措施提高了吸引客户存款的成本，尼日利亚的贷款机构正在利用昂贵的短期商业票据来填补暂时的流动性缺口。【原文：Nigerian lenders are tapping expensive short-term commercial papers to plug temporary liquidity gaps as the central bank’s cash curbs raise the cost of attracting deposits from customers.】

item.title: 美国加强对索马里境内 "伊斯兰国 "的空袭
item.description: 美军对索马里西部戈利斯山脉的伊斯兰国叛乱分子实施空袭，打死数人。【原文：US forces carried out an air strike against Islamic State insurgents in Golis Mountains in western Somalia, killing several of them.】

item.title: 世界各国努力吸收特朗普汽车关税带来的冲击
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普计划对汽车进口征收 25% 的关税，这对全球汽车制造商的股价造成了一定的影响，并引发了贸易谈判人员的争夺，以调整他们希望不会激化全球贸易战的应对措施。【原文：President Donald Trump’s plan to impose a 25% tariff on auto imports put a dent in shares of carmakers across the world and set off a scramble among trade negotiators to calibrate a response that they hope won’t intensify global trade wars.】

item.title: 江西铜业警告利润下滑后将持续波动
item.description: 中国最大的金属生产商之一江西铜业股份有限公司（Jiangxi Copper Co.【原文：Jiangxi Copper Co., one of China’s largest producers of the metal, reported full-year earnings that narrowly missed estimates and warned of ongoing volatility in the market.】

item.title: UniCredit 首席执行官将在 Anima 交易完成后审查 Banco BPM 的出价
item.description: UniCredit SpA 首席执行官 Andrea Orcel 表示，他将等待 Banco BPM SpA 对资产管理公司 Anima Holding SpA 的竞购结果，然后再决定如何进行自己对 Banco BPM 的竞购。【原文：UniCredit SpA Chief Executive Officer Andrea Orcel said he’ll wait for the outcome of Banco BPM SpA’s bid for asset manager Anima Holding SpA before deciding how to proceed with his own offer for Banco BPM.】

item.title: AMD 因与 Nvidia 竞争激烈再次被降级
item.description: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）认为，Advanced Micro Devices Inc. 的技术能力正进一步落后于 Nvidia Corp.【原文：Advanced Micro Devices Inc. is falling further behind Nvidia Corp. in its technological capabilities, a fact that could continue to pressure the stock, according to Jefferies, which downgraded the chipmaker to hold.】

item.title: 贝莱德巴西增长战略瞄准养老基金
item.description: 全球最大的资产管理公司贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：BlackRock Inc., the world’s largest asset manager, is in talks with Brazilian pension funds to expand further into the 2.9 trillion-real ($510 billion) industry.】

item.title: 特朗普对加拿大木材征收关税有可能挤压卫生纸供应
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统承诺对软木木材征收关税，这有可能扰乱供应链，而谁都不希望没有这种东西：卫生纸。【原文：President Donald Trump’s promised tariffs on softwood lumber risk disrupting the supply chain for something nobody wants to be caught without: toilet paper.】

item.title: 英国将在新债券销售策略中出售更多非现金吉尔债券
item.description: 英国正在改变其债券销售计划，将非运行金边债券纳入其中，加大力度缓解市场混乱，并利用较低的收益率。【原文：The UK is shifting its bond sale plans to include off-the-run gilts, stepping up efforts to ease dislocations in the market and to tap lower yields.】

item.title: 前美联储副主席：特朗普面临结束多年通货紧缩的风险
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战有可能将几十年来帮助缓解通胀的强大影响转向相反的方向。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s trade war risks turning powerful influences that helped ease inflation over decades in the opposite direction.】

item.title: 监管不明确，瑞银评级下调，博雅评级下调
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）股价下跌，原因是美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的分析师下调了对该公司股票的建议，称其监管资本要求不明确可能会拖上几个月。【原文：UBS Group AG declined as analysts at Bank of America Corp. lowered their recommendation on the stock, saying a lack of clarity on its regulatory capital requirements is likely to drag on for months.】
